text: jise allaah supath dikha de, vahee supathagaamee hai aur jise kupath kar de, to aap kadaapi nahin paayenge, unake lie usake siva koee sahaayak aur ham unhen ekatr karenge pralay ke din unake mukhon ke bal, andhe, goonge aur bahare banaakar aur unaka sthaan narak hai, jababhee vah bujhane lagegee, to ham use aur bhadaka denge
